TopicTitle: I need technical assistance with my new rocket

Articles.Content:
I bulided rocket but and have problem.

First stage have engines from second stage Saturn V and 2 SRBS.

Second stage is conventional 3 fuel tanks and engine, and capsule with advenced SAS.

I would like to save of my rocket to someone more experienced than me gave me advice

I\'m newbie:-)

I bulided rocket but and have problem.

First stage have engines from second stage Saturn V and 2 SRBS.

Second stage is conventional 3 fuel tanks and engine, and capsule with advenced SAS.

I would like to save of my rocket to someone more experienced than me gave me advice

I\'m newbie:-)

I dont really understand what you are asking. What is it you need help with? Upload your rocket and possible a picture so we can help you. I assume English isn\'t your native language?
Are you using mod parts? They don\'t always mix and match well with each other.. I\'d suggest just trying with stock parts, post your craft files here and we\'ll take a look
Just attach your .craft file and we can take a look for you

I attached my rocket file

I have another question, I downloaded a package of parts to the Saturn V, and built it, the only problem is that you do not have the Apollo capsule, the capsule is mounted in its place, which was one of original parts.

But I mean something else how to redirect the trajectory of a rocket to the moon, planned to enter the capsule into orbit around the moon and then introduced back to the ground, the second I did in part. The moon had escaped me. Not enough fuel to deorbit and capsule and it\'s crew become satellite ;-)

Perhaps there wasn\'t an Saturn V-capsule in the mod? I\'m sorry, I don\'t really get the question :-[

There are several guides of how to get to the mun. Just search for it here on the forums or on youtube And to get in an orbit around the mun, just retroburn when you are at periapsis when you have been caught by the mun\'s SOI (sphere of influence).

Cheers

It is a pity that there is no on-board computer, which would be used to calculate the correct TLI Burn

Can someone help me with my rocket, it has stability problems.
Make it symmetric (in terms of mass, not necessarily appearance). If it is already, use struts.

I don\'t have that mod pack..

But I\'d suggest if you are new to building space craft, try starting out with the stock stuff first, you can get around Kerbin, Mun and Minmus easily enough..

I used this mode, several parts from Saturn V

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1833.0

I recently bought this game because I thought that it\'s worthwhile, i love games that\'s deal with astronautic

I wonder if the next update will add on-board computer, it would be cool.

I know that of original parts, you can build a space shuttle, but I do not know how to do this. I built several rockets which managed to enter orbit and deorbit, but I would like to build something that resembles a space shuttle and solid rocket booster

One more question i wonder when developer introduce re-entry flames
